title: Jordan Peterson like CS Lewis exposes the Hypocrisy of Naturalism
description: CS Lewis Miracles Chapter 4. Where is the frontier between Reason and Nature? Why can Reason colonize Nature but Nature can only try to kill our attempts at Reason. Why we keep appealing to reason even if the temple of Naturalism keeps denying it.
